wordGroup: statistically significant 统计上显著的
statistically significant difference 统计上的显著差异

sentences.en: The results of the experiment are not statistically significant.
sentences.cn: 从统计学的观点看，实验结果意义不明显。

sentences.en: The difference between the two samples was not statistically significant.
sentences.cn: 在统计学的意义上，这两个样品没有显著的差异。

sentences.en: Statistically our chances of being the victims of violent crime are remote.
sentences.cn: 从统计上来看，我们成为暴力犯罪受害者的可能性是微乎其微的。
